trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> elements within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相关信息提供<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>中的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: PageContent elements are the only allowable child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: PageContent 元素都是一种<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>唯一允许的子元素

trans-unit.source: The order of the PageContent elements within the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> defines the page order.
trans-unit.target: 中的 PageContent 元素的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>定义页面顺序。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: PageContent provides information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> without the requiring the application to load individual pages.
trans-unit.target: 相关信息提供 PageContent<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>而无需应用程序以加载单个页。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> dependency property specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>依赖项属性指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的相应<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PageContent element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关 PageContent 元素的详细信息，请参阅第 3 章的 XPS*打开 XML 纸张规范*下载[XPS︰ 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when: 1.
trans-unit.target: 子属性返回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>时︰ 1。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> has an immediate <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>具有立即<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>中定义的子[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]标记。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A> has been called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> as the child of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>已调用要设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>作为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>的子级</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns **null** when: 1.
trans-unit.target: 子属性返回**null**时︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property (when specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is not cached).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>由设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>属性 (当指定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>不缓存)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>返回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>时设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this property in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况你不能在 XAML 中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>, or **null** when the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>，或**null**时<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>由设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: 加载并返回<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>内容元素。

trans-unit.source: GetPageRoot performs synchronous loading and parsing of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRoot 执行同步的加载和分析的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>instead of GetPageRoot to avoid thread blocking while the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> loads.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>而不是 GetPageRoot 以避免线程时阻止<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>加载。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>始终重新加载<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>即使它具有先前已加载并缓存;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>加载<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>只有在没有缓存的版本。

trans-unit.source: The root element of the visual tree for this page.
trans-unit.target: 此页的可视化树的根元素。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式加载，并返回<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>内容元素。

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsync asynchronously loads and parses the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> data stream associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsync 异步加载并分析<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>此<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>与关联的数据流</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Other threads will continue to run while GetPageRootAsync completes.
trans-unit.target: 其他线程将继续在 GetPageRootAsync 完成运行。

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to load the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content asynchronously: 1.
trans-unit.target: 以下步骤说明了如何加载<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>异步内容︰ 1。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>委托并将其接收的通知添加<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageRootAsync.
trans-unit.target: 调用 GetPageRootAsync。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event occurs and the delegate is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>事件发生，并且会调用的委托，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>内容已完成加载。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The loaded <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> element is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 加载<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>通过返回元素<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>。<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>始终重新加载<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>即使它具有先前已加载并缓存;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>加载<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>只有在没有缓存的版本。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> operation in progress.

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsyncCancel cancels any <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> operation that has not already finished with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsyncCancel 取消任何<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>不与已完成的操作<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>已完成。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The GetPageRootCompleted event is handled by methods based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootCompleted 事件处理方法基于<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>
